instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1707: What is A1707? A1707 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3072, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00281, 820-00928..
definitions.A1708: What is A1708? A1708 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Mid 2017, 2016 with EMC 3164, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00840, 820-00875..
definitions.A1706: What is A1706? A1706 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3071, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00239, 820-00923..

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Backlight Flex Pinout
threads.message: Hello. I'm trying to fix an <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> display assembly with bad backlight flex cable. I could only find some videos taking about <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> which apparently is not the same. I peeled off protective varnish from the cable to expose the traces and ran jumpers from them., but the video I found on YouTube shows 9 traces, I have 10 here and don't know exactly where to solder them on the other side. Anyone have a wiring diagram for this?

threads.title: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> Backlight Flex Pinout
threads.message: <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> and <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1708</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> should be the same. [URL]https://logi.wiki/index.php/<MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1706</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>/A1708_TConn_Backlight_Pinout_(FlexGate)[/URL]
